prompt: Close-up, macro photograph of a hand holding a crystal prism under a direct beam of sunlight, showcasing the rainbow refraction effect. The crystal is high quality, perfectly cut, and clear. Focus is sharp on the refracted light, blurring the hand slightly. Background is a dark, out-of-focus velvet cloth. Dramatic lighting, emphasizing the vibrant spectrum of colors. Photorealistic, professional studio lighting. --ar 16:9
name: how-to-identify-crystal-image-1.png

prompt: A split-screen image showcasing two wine glasses side-by-side. On the left, a lead crystal glass with sharp, clean cuts, reflecting light with brilliance. On the right, a standard glass with rounded edges and less clarity. A hand is gently tapping each glass with a metal rod, creating a subtle vibration. The background is a blurred, elegant dining room setting. Soft, diffused lighting. Detailed textures and reflections. Photorealistic, professional product photography. --ar 16:9
name: how-to-identify-crystal-image-2.png

prompt: An expert gemologist examining a raw amethyst crystal with a magnifying loupe. The crystal is held in a clamp, with a bright light source illuminating its internal structure. The gemologist is wearing professional attire and is focused intently on the crystal. The background is a cluttered, but organized gemological lab with various tools and specimens. Sharp focus on the crystal and the loupe. Natural, slightly warm lighting. Photorealistic, documentary style. --ar 16:9
name: how-to-identify-crystal-image-3.png

prompt: Overhead shot of a collection of various crystal specimens (quartz, amethyst, citrine, selenite, etc.) arranged on a light table. Each crystal is labeled with a small, handwritten tag. The light table is glowing softly, highlighting the internal structures and colors of the crystals. Composition is clean and organized, with the crystals arranged in a visually appealing pattern. Bright, even lighting. Photorealistic, scientific illustration style. --ar 16:9
name: how-to-identify-crystal-image-4.png

prompt: A vintage lead crystal vase filled with water, illuminated by a blacklight. The water is glowing with a subtle blue/purple fluorescence. The vase is sitting on a dark antique wooden table. The background is a dimly lit room with vintage wallpaper. Focus is sharp on the vase and the glowing water. Dramatic, moody lighting. Photorealistic, fine art photography style. --ar 16:9
name: how-to-identify-crystal-image-5.png
